Baruna is a Premium and High-Quality Online Marketplace, Store, Sell, & Buy NFT Mobile App UI Kit with 152 Screens which is highly customizable. Designs are available in Figma. In addition, the design is also equipped with a version of Light & Dark Mode.


Baruna is designed in a trendy and modern way, with all layers well organized. Baruna is equipped with a large design system with 500+ components.


In addition, the application design in figma has been designed with fully auto layout, so it is very adaptive if you want to delete or add some parts. If you are not familiar with auto layout, you can turn it off by right-clicking the layer, and selecting remove auto layout.


The design is available in my:

Gumroad | UI8


Features:

  • 150+ Screens
  • Compatibility: Figma
  • Light & Dark Mode
  • Big Design System & 500+ Components
  • Fully Auto Layout
  • Fully Customizable
  • Well Organized Layers System
  • Unique, Stylish & Modern
  • Used Google Free Fonts
  • Used Grid System
  • Pixel Perfect Design
